topic.title: Initial selling proposition: PT04.01.01
topic.shortdesc: Initial selling proposition is the information that salesperson gives to its potential client.

body.p: There is huge misunderstanding between Salesperson and Project team. The problem is that our products are mainly custom and complicated. To shorten the misunderstanding gaps, Salesperson and Business Analyst work together.

It's crucial to lead potential client to the purchasing the products smoothly but Business Analyst starts communicate with salesperson and client lately, when some wrong promises may be given to the potential client. Wrong promise leads to lost client and if given to potential client information doesn't align to standard products and we want to have this client, Project team faced to rising Project costs due to wasting time and money on creating custom components add-ons and applications on the Project level. While in the product line there are standard solutions that aligns with clients required tasks, though they handle those tasks with a bit different way client suppose to.

Initial selling proposition is a First bottleneck within Project Implementation process. Salesperson gives to potential client some information about products. But products are not the same as possibilities and it's important to understand the difference to offer products instead of possibilities. So, to go through First bottleneck we must provide Salesperson with the correct information.

Assume that your client ask you about New payment task within Desktop Internet banking application. There are four main searching possibilities for information to answer client's question.
I am the Absolute truth It's up to you, you are the best, know everything, and don't need any information.
Full text search or AI agent help Enter searching detail that you know about task (task ID: PT04.01.01, task title, Role that handles the task, etc.), depending on details searching results are provided.
Step-by-step guidance
Step-by-step guidance is the most fast and precise way of getting information from client to understand what real client's question is about. Client may use task term (internal bank or competitive product's) that is different to ours and it is hard to understand context.
Go through following Step by step guidance to find information about banking specific task.
Find out with your client what banking Role handles the task and what Category the task is.
Go to Knowledge Base section and select the role client mentioned to review tasks that are assigned to this Role. We recommend you to open the Role's task list in a new tab to comfortably switch between this guide and needed sections
Find within the task list the Task title client is talking about.
Select needed task within the list and main Task page will be opened.
Select parameter Task handle UI page and review the UI page.
Select Step-by-step guidance section to review how to handle the task
Use Task's PID to include it to the initial selling proposition.If we have such tool (AI agent script), the Initial selling proposition document will be generated automatically and all needed related to the Project implementation process information (DBOS component, Workspace, Task UI page, UX logic, Data object etc.) will be there.
Go to the next client's need.
Table of content search To get information you need to answer the client's question you may go to section, scroll down the page, select needed product , select section, review Use case (Task) list within page and select needed Task to get all needed information.
